alert.note: Alert for Chowan; Pasquotank; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL AFFECT CENTRAL PASQUOTANK...PERQUIMANS AND SOUTHEASTERN CHOWAN COUNTIES... At 415 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Snug Harbor, or near Hertford, moving northeast at 25 mph. Winds in excess of 40 mph are possible with this storm. This storm will be near... Hertford and Burgess around 425 PM EDT. Winfall around 430 PM EDT. Chapanoke around 440 PM EDT. Elizabeth City, Elizabeth City State University and Nixonton around 445 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Bob White Fork, Holiday Island, Rabbit Corner, Drummond Point, Symonds Creek, Parkville, Woodville, Yeopim Station, Okisko and Forestburg. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm, and may cause localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
